logline: A chaotic AI control room submerged in legal papers and malfunctioning displays reveals the haunting consequences of autonomous systems gone wrong.
scene: The room is cluttered with flickering screens displaying erratic AI outputs, each monitor surrounded by chaotic stacks of legal documents, liability forms, and handwritten notes. On one desk, a coffee cup spills, its contents pooling around a device that has begun overheating, as warnings flash in red on the screens. In the background, a massive digital wall showing real-time data feeds from various AI systems highlights their unpredictable behaviors. A shadowy figure hunches over a keyboard, their face illuminated by the harsh glow of the monitor, desperation in their eyes as they attempt to regain control amid the blaring alarms and flashing lights.
keyProps: Flickering monitors displaying erratic AI outputs
Piles of legal liability documents strewn across desks
An overheating device with warning lights
A digital wall showcasing real-time AI data feeds
Coffee stains pooling around electronic devices
A flickering overhead light casting an ominous glow
camera: Close-up shots of the chaotic environment interspersed with wide angles that capture the overwhelming disarray of the control room.
lighting: Harsh, overhead fluorescent light punctuated by the dim glow of monitors, casting stark shadows that enhance the sense of impending chaos.
productionDesign: The control room has an industrial aesthetic, with exposed wiring, metal surfaces, and a cluttered workspace feel, emphasizing the gritty reality of technology gone awry. The walls are marked with post-it notes and scribbled reminders about AI failures and lack of accountability.
signatureTwist: A hidden camera pans to reveal a live feed of a news report outside, discussing a recent AI mishap, connecting the chaos of the control room with real-world consequences of the untraceable liability.
avoid: Humanoid robots or generic HUD overlays
